Header: New Governors appointed for five Provinces
Content: Five new Governors have been appointed. The newly appointed Governors took oaths before President Maithripala Sirisena at the Presidential Secretariat today. Accordingly Azath Sally is the new Governor of the Western Province. MaithriGunaratne took oaths as the new Governor of the Central Province. SaarathEkanayake took oaths as the new Governor of the North Central Province. PeshalaJayaratne is the new Governor of the Northwestern Province. M.L.A.M. Hisbullah has been appointed as the new Governor of the Eastern Province.
